author: donaldp
msg: Added the ExecOutputHandler abstraction so that tasks don't have to worry about more complicated stream parsing and can work with just notification of lines appearing.
Also added a default implementation that conforms to the most common pattern of making stdout info log messages and stderr warn log messages
